Description: Fragment of oval handle to sharp turn of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine pink-red; cream slip. Rectangular stamp.
Curator's comments: Ink, deleted, '482' Name Teisagoras. From the same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, CEALEX TAL 140.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (271)
